mapper.insert: insert into user( user_id, user_password, user_email, user_name ) values( #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_email}, #{user_name} )
insert into user( user_id, user_password, user_email, user_name, user_grade ) values( #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_email}, #{user_name}, 2 )
mapper.select: select distinct car_name from car_data order by car_name asc
select distinct car_year from car_data order by cast(car_year as int) asc
select distinct car_ref_accident from car_reference_accident order by cast(car_ref_accident as int) asc
select distinct car_ref_distance from car_reference_distance order by cast(car_ref_distance as int) asc

select user.user_seq, user_id, user_token, user_name, user_email, user_join_date, user_grade, visitor.visit_date from user join visitor where (user.user_seq = visitor.user_seq) and visitor.visit_date in (select max(visitor.visit_date) from visitor group by visitor.user_seq) group by user.user_seq order by user.user_seq asc

select user.user_seq, user_id, user_token, user_name, user_email, user_join_date, user_grade, visitor.visit_date from user join visitor where (user.user_seq = visitor.user_seq) and visitor.visit_date in (select max(visitor.visit_date) from visitor group by visitor.user_seq) and user.user_id like concat('%', #{user_search}, '%') group by user.user_seq order by user.user_seq asc
select count(user_seq) user_count from user
select board_seq, board_subject, user.user_id, board_hit, board_wdate from board join user where (user.user_seq = board.user_seq) order by board_seq asc

select board_seq, board_subject, user.user_id, board_hit, board_wdate from board join user where (user.user_seq = board.user_seq) and board.board_subject like concat('%', #{board_search}, '%') order by board_seq asc
select visit_date, count(visit_seq) visit_count, sum(count(visit_seq)) over(order by visit_date) visit_sum_count from visitor group by visitor.visit_date order by visit_date desc
select user_join_date, count(user_seq) user_count, sum(count(user_seq)) over(order by user_join_date) user_sum_count from user group by user_join_date order by user_join_date desc
select board_wdate, count(board_seq) board_count, sum(count(board_seq)) over(order by board_wdate) board_sum_count from board group by board_wdate order by board_wdate desc

select board.board_seq, board_subject, board_content, board_hit, date_format(board_wdate, '%Y-%m-%d') board_wdate, user_seq, board_pic_seq, u_pic_name from board inner join board_picture where board.board_seq = board_picture.board_seq group by board.board_seq order by board_seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into board( board_seq, board_subject, board_content, board_hit, board_wdate, user_seq ) values( 0, "${board_subject}", '${board_content}', 0, now(), ${user_seq} )
insert into board_picture( board_pic_seq, o_pic_name, u_pic_name, board_seq ) values( 0, "${o_pic_name}", "${u_pic_name}", (select max(board_seq) from board) )
